sentence: Abrams ran for governor in 2018 and lost to Georgia's current governor, Brian Kemp, a Republican, though she never conceded.
author: Rebecca Downs
title: Is It Possible Not Even Stacey Abrams Wants to Associate with Joe Biden?

author: Eva McKend
title: 'I did the work and now I want the job': Stacey Abrams kicks second bid for Georgia governor into high gear
